edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.ideal.simplify

Class AffineExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.ideal.simplify.AffineExpression

  • public class AffineExpression
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents an expression of the form aX+b, where X is a "pseudo primitive polynomial", and a and b are concrete numbers.

    A Polynomial X is a pseudo-primitive polynomial if all of the following hold:

    1. X is a polynomial with no constant term
    2. the leading coefficient of X is positive
    3. if X is real: leading coefficient is 1
    4. if X is int: the gcd of the absolute values of the coefficients of X is 1
    If aX=0, then X is null and coefficient is 0.
